resources.string: The new tax regime was introduced in Budget 2020 wherein the tax slabs were altered, and taxpayers were offered concessional tax rates. However, those who opt for the new regime cannot claim several exemptions and deductions, such as HRA, LTA, 80C, 80D , and more.
Senior citizens may get certain tax benefits in the old regime.
Salaried individuals and pensioners enjoy certain standard deductions in tax payments.

Simplify your taxes with our two powerful features:

Tax Calculator: Quickly and accurately calculate your income tax liability for the current financial year. Get instant results based on your income, deductions, and investments.

Tax Planner: Plan your taxes strategically for the year ahead. Explore various investment options and tax-saving strategies to minimize your tax burden and maximize your savings.

The Indian tax system is progressive, meaning higher income earners pay a higher percentage of tax. Various deductions and exemptions are available to help you reduce your tax liability. Our app helps you navigate these complexities and make informed decisions about your taxes.

Choose your path and take control of your taxes today!
